Package peersim.kademlia

Class KeyValueStore

java.lang.Object
peersim.kademlia.KeyValueStore
public class KeyValueStore extends Object
The memory store will keep data inside the class, for a specific amout of time
Version:
0.1
Author:
Deisss (LGPLv3)

      Delete an entry from the memory store
      Parameters:

      Returns:
